column1: "Another, far more realistic possibility is that there’s only one Trump, indivisible, and that a straight line connects his freakishly abysmal + frequently loony handling of the coronavirus crisis + his supposedly brave gestures towards Israel...

"...about Israel’s wellbeing; the kind of president who prescribes Clorox as a remedy for coronavirus." But Israel doesn't see any problem, and just views Trump as "wise and courageous, who adores Israel and grants its every wish, as he should", Chemi Shalev writes...
